input.sentences: we could n't believe how much of a disaster the car was after the wreck .
even the tires were nearly falling off .
but instead of getting down | we decided to treat ourselves to a beer .
some of us | in fact | needed more than one .
output.sentences: It was a sad day when Roberto wrecked his car.
One of the tires was even falling off.
Of course, Roberto somehow managed to be in good spirits, treating himself with a beer the day after the crash.
His girlfriend Erica wore a neck brace from the accident, but she still enjoyed the post-crash party.
